mapper.sql: fy_trans_data t left join merch_info as m on t.merchantno_fuiou = m.merchno left join merchant_main as dept on m.mc_id = dept.mc_id
mapper.select:
select t.id as id , t.ins_cd as order_Id, t.out_trade_no as trace_no , t.total_fee as amt, t.merchantno_fuiou as merchant_id, dept.name, t.share_benefit, t.createtime as txn_datetime, t.terminal_trace as txn_ref, t.terminal_id , right(t.cardno,4) as shortPan, t.pay_status as respCode, t.pay_type as issuerCode , t.card_type as cardType
from
WHERE
order by t.id asc
limit #{offset}, #{limit}
